definition: (of a watercourse) to breach its banks/(of a dam) to burst
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Flood waters poured through a gap in the embankment of the swollen jumna river.
sentences.chinese: 亞穆納河漲水，洪水從河堤的一道決口衝了出來。

sentences.english: If dam breaks, a flash flood could threaten downstream villages. (AP Photo/Shabbir Ahmed Mir)
sentences.chinese: 如果大壩決口，暴漲和洪水可能威脅到下游的村民。

sentences.english: A dam burst and flooded their villages.
sentences.chinese: 堤壩決口，淹沒了他們的村莊。

sentences.english: No matter what happens, I will never lose heart.
sentences.chinese: 不管發生什麼，人將決不得到決口。

sentences.english: Flood waters poured through a gap in the embankment of the swollen Jumna River.
sentences.chinese: 洪水從河堤的一道決口衝了出來。

sentences.english: The grain size of the sediment in distributary mouth bar is coarser than that in the crevasse splay sediment.
sentences.chinese: 三角洲前緣河口砂壩沉積物粒度較平原決口扇粗。

sentences.english: We got the news that the dam burst.
sentences.chinese: 我們得到到消息說大壩決口了。

definition: to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
lit. to directly attack Huanglong/fig. to directly combat the root of a problem
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
using the few to defeat the many (idiom); to win from a position of weakness
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
Lishi district of Lüliang city 呂梁市|吕梁市[Lu:3 liang2 shi4], Shanxi 山西
out of ammunition and no food left (idiom); in desperate straits
the critical moment/life and death crisis
lit. not knowing what's important (idiom); no appreciation of the gravity of things/naive/doesn't know who's who/no sense of priorities
Pingxing Pass, mountain pass in Shanxi Province
